content:
EventHubSender EventHubSender Class

In this Article

Edit

A client class used in send operations for an Event Hub. Represents a logical sender connection to a specific Event Hub partition.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class EventHubSender : ClientEntity, IMessageClientEntity, ICloseablePublic NotInheritable Class EventHubSender
    Inherits ClientEntity
    Implements IMessageClientEntity, ICloseable

    CreateFromConnectionString(String)
    CreateFromConnectionString(String)

    Creates a new instance of EventHubSender using the supplied connection string. Intended to be used to send using a ConnectionString with SharedAcessSignature and Publisher.

    public static EventHubSender CreateFromConnectionString(string connectionString)Public Shared Function CreateFromConnectionString(connectionString As String) As EventHubSender

    Parameters

    • connectionString
      String
      String

      The connection string used.

    Returns

    • EventHubSender
      EventHubSender

      The created EventHubSender

    Remarks

    The connection can be obtained either from the Azure portal, or created from a ServiceBusConnectionStringBuilder instance.

  • Edit
    SendBatch(IEnumerable<EventData>)
    SendBatch(IEnumerable(Of EventData))

    Sends a batch of event data to the logical partition represented by PartitionId.

    public void SendBatch(IEnumerable<EventData> eventDataList)Public Sub SendBatch(eventDataList As IEnumerable(Of EventData))

    Parameters

    • eventDataList
      IEnumerable<EventData>
      IEnumerable(Of EventData)

      An IEnumerable object containing event data instances.

    Exceptions

    • MessageSizeExceededException
      MessageSizeExceededException

      Thrown if the total serialized size of eventDataList exceeds the allowed size limit for one event transmission (256k by default).

    Remarks

    User should make sure the total serialized size of eventDataList should be under the size limit of one event data transmission, which is 256k by default.

    Remarks

    User should make sure the total serialized size of eventDataList should be under the size limit of one event data transmission, which is 256k by default.
